scripts.package-macos: npm run clean && electron-packager . electron-study --ignore=release-builds --platform=darwin --asar --arch=x64 --prune=true --overwrite=true --app-version=0.0.0 --electron-version=2.0.7 --out=release-builds && electron-installer-dmg ./release-builds/electron-study-darwin-x64/electron-study.app electron-study --out=release-builds --overwrite
scripts.package-win: npm run clean && electron-packager   . electron-study --ignore=release-builds --platform=win32  --asar --arch=x64 --prune=true --overwrite=true --app-version=0.0.0 --electron-version=2.0.7 --out=release-builds && electron-installer-zip ./release-builds/electron-study-win32-x64 ./release-builds/electron-study.zip
